data.text: @SenJeffMerkley When will your govt bring these criminals to justice? Before that, you are not qualified to point finger at Chinese domestic affairs. https://t.co/Wfyetxj6aj

@SenJeffMerkley Bullshit. This is embarrassing. Your insistence on writing a fake narrative is shameful

How would the U.S. government react...if the owner of the New York Times personally met with senior Russian or Chinese officials...lobbying them actively to bring down the U.S.
@SenJeffMerkley Snowden and Assange are exponentially better journalists than this useful for the west wacko.

@SenJeffMerkley Thanks for your support 

Please save Jimmy Lai

He is one of the bravest democracy fighters in Hong Kong. This is a unfair and unethical 

Let’s fight against China and Hong Kong dictatorship 

Fight for freedom 
Never give up
@SenJeffMerkley Trump behaves just like China’s leaders.
@SenJeffMerkley Jimmy Lai is none of your business. It is funny that now every Tom, Dick and Harry is trying to score some political brownie points …. Deal with your problems in your country first!

@SenJeffMerkley Jimmy Lai is American puppet, get dirty money from American government

Detain Lai to death https://t.co/kCiqARBM1K
